import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useUser } from './Usercontext'; import UserNavbar from './UserNavbar'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faHospital, faHeartbeat, faFlask } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const UserHome = () => { const { state } = useUser(); const { isLoggedIn, userData } = state; return ( <>
{isLoggedIn && (

Welcome, {userData.userRole || 'User'}!

Saving lives, one donation at a time.

)}
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to the Blood Donation System

Saving lives, one donation at a time.

{/* Call to Action Buttons */}
Become a Donor Request Blood
{/* Additional Information Section */}

How Blood Donation Works

Click "Become a Donor" to learn more about the eligibility criteria and donation process.

{/* Additional Information Section */}

How Blood Donation Works

If you need blood, click "Request Blood" to search for compatible donors. Become a Donor

{/* Blood Bank Information Section */}

Find a Blood Bank

Search for blood banks in your area to find the nearest location to donate blood or pick up blood requests.

Find a Blood Bank
); } export default UserHome;
